title: PGA Tour's Millionaires From the 2013-14 Season
headline: Money For Nothing: PGA Tour's Millionaires From the 2013-14 Season
description: Ninety-seven players won more than $1 million last year, many - including William McGirt, Andrew Svoboda and Scott Stallings - accrued more MCs than top-10s. Check out the other players rewarded handsomely, and see how well it pays to be on Tour.
short_headline: Money For Nothing: PGA Tour's Millionaires From the 2013-14 Season
page_title: PGA Tour's Millionaires From the 2013-14 Season
slug: Money For Nothing: PGA Tour's Millionaires From the 2013-14 Season
